Review.Contenu: Venta humidifier broke after 2 years. Tech told us to purchase 2 parts to fix which we did and it did work. We had to buy a new Venta and we asked if we could return the 2 parts and receive a credit. They said yes. Parts returned, no refund issued as of today's date. The woman who takes the orders & helps with troubleshooting loses her patience a bit and raises her voice to customer. When a person pays almost $500 for something, one expects it to last more than 2 years if properly cared for which it was. Thank you.

Review.Titre: The new Ventas do not generate the same…
Review.Contenu: The new Ventas do not generate the same humidity levels as previous models.

Purchased the Kuubel XL-T. This product failed me once the warranty expired. When you call for service you are usually greeted by an answering machine, and expected to leave a message and wait for someone to call you...if you miss that call, there's no followup, you need to call again and leave another message.Replacing the motor is not as "easy" as the manufacturer claims, and this machine was clearly designed to be made difficult to disassemble. After spending money on a new cob wheel, and motor, I ended up throwing this piece of junk in the garbage.  Never again. Good riddance.

customer service terrible no one ever answers the phone have tried mutiple times different days and times left several voice messages with phone number appears to be a fly by night service operation sent me a wrong 145.00 fan and cannot get anybody to exchange it. talking about sour grapes after purhase this is one of these items. aservice ppliance works very well  but hope you dont need any parts or to contact someone to help you.good luck stuck with a 145.00 fan that doesnt fit/work  my airwasher.

Review.Titre: I bought Venta humidifierLW25 a month…
Review.Contenu: I bought Venta humidifierLW25 a month ago. It raises the humidity during 12hours of continuous work only by 3% which is not enough for required humidity for my piano. I tried to call Venta several times. Nobody ever answered the phone. At last I found call back from Ashley but she dictated her phone number so fast that it was impossible to identify it.  I wonder if it was done  on purpose.

Review.Titre: I’m unable to activate this item
Review.Contenu: I’m unable to activate this item.  I need help.  At 86 yrs old I’m active on line but this is too much. I only made this purchase because my bedroom Venta humidifier has been so helpfulTried to install wi fi info unsuccessfully. At this price I’m entitled to better service.Right now the screen is black + I don’t know what to do.     V. mascali.    586 383 0059

Review.Titre: Stopped working after just two weeks
Review.Contenu: We have owned the Venta LW45 Comfort Plus for two weeks or so, and it just stopped running with the error pop up message "E2."  There is no obstruction in wheels, as the instructions suggest to check for....water level is correct, we have tried to reset.   This is very disappointing after making such a large investment.  I will now have to reach out to tech support.We had no space to store "the original packaging" so if that is required as stated in the manual in order to return the unit, that will be another issue.

Review.Titre: How can you only ship one item out of the only two things I ordered.
Review.Contenu: I ordered the 15 airwasher and water treatment. You guys only shipped me the water solution. No number to call, no weekend ticket reply. For the whole week of suffering from dry lung and short breathe, now I need to suffer another week and have to buy another humidifier to ease my miserable sleep at night.

Review.Titre: I have had the venta 45 running…
Review.Contenu: I have had the venta 45 running continuously on high for 14 days or more and the humidity measures only 35% or less. The room is only 350ft2 which is way smaller than this machine is supposed to handle. Maybe I will just return it and try another make.

Well, you sent me what I ordered, and it got here on time and undamaged, which is a miracle because of the truly LOUSY packaging!  My LW45 was in the fairly flimsy box that it leaves the factory in--you know, the one with colored illustrations all over it.  No sturdy, brown outer shipping carton, none at all.  It was sealed lackadaisically with the bare minimum of clear tape, which had torn loose at both ends but was still attached across most of the flaps, which is a good thing for you cuz otherwise I'd be filing any angry claim for replacement instead of just a 1-star review.  I was amazed that all of the contents seemed to be in there and undamaged, considering.

Review.Titre: BROKEN product received with circuits exposed
Review.Contenu: Updated on Dec 22Really terrible service… have been waiting for more than three weeks but still no one gets back to me and tell me how to ship it back. Worst service you could ever imagine——We received a completely defective and broken product today. It's clearly returned by someone else and sent out without any check. I never received such broken product in my lifetime, I’m really super angry and disappointed.1 there are multiple falling parts, broken panels everywhere2 multiple circuits are exposed out, which is very dangerous for humidifier3 package is totally brokenI've sent over emails with pictures five days ago (I wish I could also attach the pictures here), but didn't get any reply up to now. Really bad purchase experience and service, will never purchase Venta product again.

Review.Titre: Terrible scented oils - Don't purchase and they don't give any refunds
Review.Contenu: I am writing re: the scented oils, not the actual Venta airwasher which I like and have had for years.The oils don't really work.  There is almost no fragrance.  You have to add extra to get any benefit and they are expensive and I just found out that in the terms and conditions (which I did not have time to read!  I thought it was a simple order!) it states that you cannot return any liquids for a refund, not even if they are deficient.  How terrible!  Plus I ordered a lot because I didn't want to pay their exhorbitant S&H.  They really know how to get you, unfortunately.

Review.Titre: Defective Touch Screen Controls and Unhelpful Customer Support
Review.Contenu: I ordered a Venta Kuuboid XL Max LP60W directly from Venta USA at the recommendation of my doctor for my allergies.  The unit arrived with a non-functioning touch screen control panel.  After exchanging emails with someone named Gillian at Venta USA, I was asked to send the unit back by UPS to Venta for repairs.  Gillian confirmed receipt of the unit about 2 weeks ago on January 5th.  But since then Gillian has not responded to any of my emails asking for a sense of when the repairs will be finished.  And when I called the customer support telephone number I constantly get a automated voicemail message.  Venta’s customer support is really unhelpful if you have a service issue.

Review.Titre: My Venta stopped humidifying after one…
Review.Contenu: My Venta stopped humidifying after one season of use. Although I called the 800 number and left a message, it took 2 weeks to get my call returned. And the person who called told me she was new and didn't know the answer and forwarded my message to her boss. That was about a month ago and no one has called. Could never recommend this product to anyone.

I ordered $3,000 of humidifiers and accessories.  Received an email that they were ready to ship. The next day, I received an email that said my order was cancelled due to no inventory of this item.  This is very frustrating as I desperately need these due to severely dry air in my home.  I don't understand why I was allowed to place the order if they don't have the inventory.  I would have ordered something else.

Review.Titre: Venta rips you off on the shipping…
Review.Contenu: Venta rips you off on the shipping charges.  I was charged $19.99 to ship a $25.00 bottle of the Water Treatment Additive.  I can understand a fair shipping charge ($10], but $19.99 is highway robbery!  The humidifier is a good product.

Review.Titre: Dead motor 2 months out of 2 yr warranty
Review.Contenu: Bought a LW45 in September 2020.  Used for about seven months in 2020 and 2021.  Always cleaned carefully and used the Venta additive.   November 2022, time to turn it on -- current flows to motor, lights flash for a second and then nothing.   Called customer service.  Rep tells me that based on my description of what's happening, it is a failed motor.   Cost to replace, now that I am out of the two year warranty (used to be a ten year warranty, but not any more):  $120.63 plus tax.    How could this have happened?  It worked OK and now it just won't start?   Her response "They just sometimes go bad."  Really,  so now, two months out of the two year warranty, with what is clearly a defective motor, I am required to purchase a new motor, oh, and, do the replacement operation myself.   Absolutely no consideration given by Venta for this being what is so obviously a defective motor, and only two months out of warranty.

It's December 23rd and I just opened my air washer. The top housing was disengaged and shattered on both ends.The buttons were not attached and were loose in the box. EXTREMELY poor packaging/shipping. The air washer was shipped in its own box. It really should have been packed inside of another box with bubble wrap or some sort of padding around the outside of it's box. Lord knows how it was tossed around before it reached me. It was shipped to me from Aurora Illinois by United Parcel. I need a return ticket so I can ship it back to you. I expect a brand new unit in return.

I bought my first LW45 3 years ago and like it so much that I bought a second 2nd LW45 2 years ago. A malfunctioning gearbox put the second unit out of service and I can't get a response from Venta to order a replacement part; no response to my phone message after a week and a half, no response to my follow-up e-mail, and chat seems to be chronically unavailable. If Venta no longer allows customers to order replacement parts directly they really need to improve their customer support.

I ordered a Venta Comfort Plus LW25 Airwasher Humidifier white color through Amazon. I got the wrong color at first and I replaced it. And now I have another wrong color again! Is there any way to make sure that I will get the right color if I reorder it?

When I ordered my AW902 their site was out but I managed to order from the German Amazon page. Because I bought it in Europe it came with a European power cord. I emailed the company and they informed me they are sold out of power cords, I'll have to wait a few months until they restock before I can purchase one from them. They didn't suggest any alternatives.I found a cord that works, powered it up and found that it didn't work. The hygiene disk was no good as all the sediment inside packed itself to one side, preventing it from turning in the humidifier. I again emailed Vanta and they suggested I either purchase a new disk or return my unit and buy direct from them. I chose to buy a new hygiene disk.I installed the new disk, ran it for a week and the humidity didn't go above 42% except when I turned on another humidifier. The entire time it was running in fan speed 5 in turbo mode. It's been a brisk winter so far, staying mostly above freezing. My home is roughly 1200 sq ft.

I wanted to submit my warrentee for my new Venta humidifier. I didn't want to take the machine apart to find the serial number. That is a ploy you use so people don't turn in their warrantee. This really pissed me off!Alan J. Steinke

extremely bad, first you sent me a wrong item, instead of humidifier/purifier you sent me cheap purifier. Second customer service phone number is not working number, after i was able to reach someone by email customer service was so bad that they made us to come over to pick a correct item instead of arranging anything on correcting your company faulty business. Very bad experience.

Review.Titre: Order never arrived, support is non-existent
Review.Contenu: My order from Venta never arrived. After a month, I e-mailed them; to date, I've also received no reply from their support team.I'll have to chargeback my order with the credit-card company.

Review.Titre: Worst customer service - customer beware - do not buy from them directly
Review.Contenu: This is probably the worst customer service on the planet. First my order didn’t get fulfilled with the items I ordered but rather what was in stock that someone thought was the best option for me (I ordered an airwasher in black and was sent a white one). The item came on its own box that had a box cutter cut all across the box. As if that wasn’t sufficient only one out of the three items ordered was shipped. I must have left at least 4 voicemail messages and sent at least a dozen emails to get it fixed with no avail. Emails to customer support and use of their website contact forms seem to get swallowed by a black hole. You as a customer is left out in the dark about what is going on with your order - they provide no updates or explanation. Then finally after a million emails a partial refund was issued but just for the airwasher - neither were the other two items ever shipped nor refunded. Customer care at this company is no care at all. To date issue has not been resolved and I had to file a complaint with the Better Business Bureau. Customer beware - do not buy from this company directly - order at Bed and Bath or Amazon where you can at least get decent customer service and be assured you will get what you paid for and properly refunded if need be!!

Review.Titre: Don’t buy anything from this company
Review.Contenu: Don’t buy anything from this company. The actual products Venta sells work OK but require a lot of your time to lug water and refill them daily and then the  machines require you to do a deep cleaning of them every 10-14 days which is very a time consuming and messy process, (about 1 hour per machine), and you have to BUY their cleaning products to use in doing it. You also have to buy their expensive water cleaning additive to then add to the refill water after you’ve cleaned the machine and it not only costs a lot but is hard to locate and then you have to pay for the shipping costs on top of that because there are to local retail supply outlets. To make matters worse there are no local stores to get stuff from in regards to the frequent cleaning supplies required and or if repairs are need. Everything is a long-distance back and forth shipping process and they are anything but speedy or proficient. Their whole objective is to not only sell you an expensive item but once that is done they will have you locked in to having to buy a lot more stuff from them, (by long distance), at their high price so you can just run the machine.

Review.Titre: venta air technologies finally honors warranty
Review.Contenu: venta air technologies honors warranty after BBB complaint & Trustpilot review. They still wanted $32USD to ship 1.9oz part but finally waived it when I refused to pay.  Initially they refusesd to honor their 10 year Warranty as advertises on both the product box and thieir user manual. We purchased a Venta LW45 just over 2 years ago, registered it online and all was fine until it started clicking. I emailed Venta and was told my warranty is expired. I said they were mistaken and I sent images to prove my 10 year warranty but they still refuse to honor it. At the time of purchase the warranty was one of the reasons I chose Venta. I was never informed that Venta had changed their policy or I would have returned it. The 10 year warranty is both on the box and in the user manual. But now they said ........."Our paper warranty registration applications as well as our manuals states “10-year warranty” which we do understand because we do have units that have a 10-year warranty. If you visit our website under “ Warranty” you will see that it is only for a duration of 24 months. However, one can only quality for the 10-year warranty if the unit was purchased before August of 2020. Since you purchased your unit in October of 2020, you have a limited 2-year warranty." ...... This is just wrong ! We feel that the manufacturer of this product has misreppresented their product; if they had changed their warranty policy that information should have been communicated to prospective purchasers prior to the sale by changing the warranty information on the product box and manual. They also had the opportunity to advise us of a policy change when we registered our warranty on line and they did not.
my package arrived damaged.  It was poorly packed and the glass vials of aromatic oils shattered all over everything.

I ordered 2 Kuubel XL-Ts.  The first one I opened and setup and it says door open.  Door isn’t open.  Can’t get help from customer service.   Emailed to ask if I could return the other one I haven’t opened.   Also no response…..

Review.Titre: I have not received my Venta products…
Review.Contenu: I have not received my Venta products yet! I called the company and left a message stating this, but no reply at this point .

Review.Titre: I ordered a venta comfort plus air…
Review.Contenu: I ordered a venta comfort plus air washer several weeks ago after reading good reviews about their products. In order to complete my purchase online and take advantage of their coupon code (which didn't work on Amazon) I had to order direct from the company and request a shipping address different from my billing address. I called for a week straight during their posted business hours and could not get a hold of customer service at all. I finally emailed them and quickly got a response and help with my order. So I place the order over the phone, confirmed everything with whom I was speaking, and then waited for the item. A week later it finally arrives and it's the wrong air washer!!! They sent me a cheaper version of the item I ordered. So then, I had to take time out of my day to contact them again, get a return label and return the item to UPS. So incredibly annoying. They even confirmed my order was correct and they shipped me the wrong item. I understand mistakes can be made, but they didn't even include an invoice with my order. That's pretty basic if you ask me. In addition, this might have all been avoided if they simply updated their website to include a spot for different shipping and billing address. It doesn't end here though, because in order for them to send me the correct product I was told I had to wait until they received the one I returned at their warehouse. They received it 3 days after I returned it according to UPS based on the tracking number. It's been a week since then and I still haven't received my order. I'm waiting on feedback today, but only because I had to keep emailing them to get a response. Completely ridiculous. I would have rather paid more and order from Amazon then deal with this. I really wanted to like this company, but having me be inconvencied and wait longer for something that is not my mistake is bad customer service.
I never received my item. It returned to sender without any explanation.
While I appreciate the elegant technology, the until recommended for my square footage was inadequate. The company would not allow me to trade up.

Following up on a package that was never received due to damage during shipment which I assume was packaged poorly Customer service should have been more apologetic I should not have been told that you needed to check with UPS to see if they will cover your cost that's your problem not mine and not a good impression for a new customer No wonder you use online chat and not answer your phones You seem to care more about the money in your pocket then you do in your customers who are the ones filling your pockets !!! This is making me think twice if your product is worth it or if I should return and use another company, pay less and have better Customer Service

Review.Titre: Received the Venta LW45 original from…
Review.Contenu: Received the Venta LW45 original from Amazon today and I must be living in a different reality than the vast majority weighing in here. This is not quiet by any stretch of the imagination. So I happen to own a db meter also, it measured 56db/68db/75db (at 3 inches from the top) - no where near as quiet as the stated noise levels on their site. In 2nd gear it now sounds like a motorboat across the lake effect. I can't bare to listen to it for a few days just to see if it actually works well otherwise... WILL return it ASAP - what a let down !!! / and it's over priced

BUYER BEWARE! The Worst After Sales Customer Service!You'll be lucky to have someone return your calls to begin with and then you're dealing with incompetents. 6 months after trying to reach someone I'm now told they wont fix our 5 Kuube units because they're out of warranty. These are current models that they wont service and where still under warranty when we first contacted them! We're out thousands of dollars purchasing Venta products that they won't service!

Review.Titre: Your customer service rep was unaccommodating and argumentative.
Review.Contenu: The customer service rep was unaccommodating and argumentative, and my order still has not shipped out after a week and a half. Venta is the ONLY vendor for the part I need, so I am forced to still go through with the purchase. Otherwise, I would gladly take my business elsewhere. An email to customer service regarding my order status also has not been answered after two business days.

At time of purchase, I was told the Kuube L-T would perform 3 functions, humidify, purify, and aroma therapy. To date, there are no accessories available to initiate aroma therapy. I believe this product was placed on the market before everything was developed. And what really burns me is that I believed the salesman when he told me that the 3 functions listed above offsets the 1000 price tag.

I had my new product on all weekend. My current Ventra goes Thru about an entire bucket per day. The water didn’t go down 1/4 inch in 3 days. Will need to exchange it. Thank you. Charles Russ. 729 Jefferson St. Hinsdale IL. 60521

Regretfully. Disappointment concerning communication.  Follow up with the order status by email lacking. Placed order 18 Sep. Today is 12 Oct. Still no reply. Confusion over return label sent by email. Also an email notice that "the order is being processed." Still no shipment or delivery.

I am wondering whether your website has been hacked, and the hacker sent the first email with your company email.

Review.Titre: This company scams you when it comes to…
Review.Contenu: This company scams you when it comes to shipping. Most websites show you the shipping cost prior to final purchase. This website shows you afterwards. I disputed it with my credit card company, filed a BBB complaint & working on a Federal Trade Commission complaint. I sent them an email questioning it & received a generic response that did not address my original email. Warning do not buy from this company.

Venta has a huge quality control problem.  I bought a 3 venta hygiene discs box and ALL THREE were non-usable because the "sand" or whatever is inside the disc leaked all over the bottom of the water receptacle.  These discs are very expensive.  The Kuubel is very expensive.  Seems like reliability is for the first year only and then you can't get quality parts.  NOT "made with care in Germany" would be a more accurate decal on the box.  This is very disappointing.

Review.Titre: I ordered a clutch for my Venta…
Review.Contenu: I ordered a clutch for my Venta Humidifier.  The clutch cost $8.00 and the shipping was $7.99.  All they did was put the plastic part in a paded envelope.  The part arrived lopsided due to being crushed in shipping.  I will see if it gets straight when I install it.  For the $7.99 in shipping and handling they could have a least spent 10cents for a box to put the part in so it would not get deformed in shipping.  It was not a very rewarding experience.

Review.Titre: This is a very expensive humidifier…

It began making noises before the failure.  I have had it!!!!.  It is sitting near the door for placement in the trash.

Review.Titre: It uses no water. Updated; Working perfectly 12-24-2018
Review.Contenu: Well, I was going to give it a chance. I have had it on since it arrived and it has never used a drop of water. I was going to call the company and ask why. Yes, it is turned on and the motor runs.I have the larger one and love it, it uses 4 gallons of water per day.Update; It is working great now and uses over a gallon of water per day. Perhaps the humidity was high at the time.  I highly recommend these units. I have had my first one for four years and it has improved the quality of air tremendously. Thank you for inventing a fine product.

I received only half of my order (order#6059). I have left a message at 888-333-8218 and called 630-851-2111 and was given a lady named Jullian phone number and email address. Review.Titre: Order still not shipped after almost…

My day started where I went onto the website to order a few $5 reasonably priced power supplies which I assumed would have been the easiest thing in the world as I’ve ordered many small $5 Knick knacks off the internet with easy, speed and no problems. The easiest part of this experience is the checkout (right because everyone just wants their money) but I wasn’t complaining since I had so many easy options to pay and that went great. Now here is where everything went downhill. I receive an email the next day stating immediate action required to finish my order, first I’m thinking ok what’s going on I paid, the site said in stock, what’s up? So I spend the next day in the morning calling every 20 minutes for a couple hours trying to get thru their line with nothing but voicemail as if they don’t have a job to pick up the phone. Finally I get thru and the person who answers the phone seems nice and attentive, then again here we go with the downhill part. First I’m told that ‘there is limited power supplies in stock’ and that the other warehouse may have them. And I know that was all a bunch of bologna because the end result was getting my order shipped the next day but we’ll get there. So next I’m asked why and where I got my ventas because I needed power supplies, and if I would have known I signed up for 21 questions I wouldn’t have wasted my time. Next, I had show ‘proof’ of purchases that I made in order to have my order completed. Now at this point I’m seriously irritated. All this work for a five dollar item, being lied to, feeling as if I’m some sort of criminal because all I did was order some items online from the comfort of my home like everyone else this day n age. It’s like what else do you want from me, my social security number or my bank account like really come on. Anyways, I proceeded to email the screenshots of my proof of purchase and waste more of my time because at this point I didn’t care and just wanted my stuff I ordered. It’s been shipped, I hope there isn’t a problem with that so I’m still waiting and we’ll see.

Just pure pure luck that it was not taken.  Ring the bell and WAIT to be buzzed into inner lobby to leave packages.  Tell your boss that it takes time. Venta should find another way to deliver or have products available at retail outlets like you used to do!

It works.  But when it's cold and the central heating is running, it can't maintain proper humidity for a bedroom, even with the door closed to the rest of the house.  Maybe two of these would do it, but the cost is insane.  I might as well install a whole-house unit at that point.The fan is not well balanced and causes an uneven noise.  This means that in low or medium modes, you can hear random sounds that are too obviously random to qualify as comfortable white noise.  Can't sleep unless it's on high (because the fan gets fast and loud enough to hide the random sounds) or off.It's a cute piece of engineering but for the price, it's not good enough.  If I had paid only 15% of what I paid, I'd be happy with it.  Because I paid a fortune for what is mostly a plastic box and a fan, I am not happy with it.

They make a tremendous difference for me in keeping the level of humidity manageable for my asthma. However, I must have the Airwasher Additive and Cleaner  to keep them up to snuff because the water in this area is VERY hard. My problem with Venta-USA is that this is the second time I have ordered both of these products and other than receiving a confirmation of order and a "gee, it might take a while to receive it", I have heard nothing. No updates, no anticipated date of arrival - nothing. The first time I was more willing to give them the benefit of the doubt regarding them having to wait for supplies on backorder. This second time around I am not feeling quite so generous. I have to wonder why the company has such a hard time keeping stock in hand and getting it out, inasmuch as these products are essential for my Airwashers. I'm becoming disgruntled with Venta-USA.

Rather than empathizing with my gear part and rubber housing issues, I was tersely informed that "no proof of purchase, no warranty -- read your warranty".2. When I pointed out that one of my orders was made through Venta's online platform and gave an order number, the response was, sorry, we can't check that -- our systems have been changed and don't "speak" to each other.  This was made my problem rather than apologizing for it being Venta's problem.3,  I asked for the agent's name and s/he insisted on remaining anonymous -- this isn't best practice and doesn't create a personal connection with your company.  4.  I mentioned that I'd sent in warranty cards with serial numbers but was informed that these don't count when its comes to product support.5. I have had to dig through files to find the proofs of purchase and could only find two.  Now I feel bad that I won't be able to get support for my other 3 units.

Review.Titre: Sorry, but they are over priced and over-hyped
Review.Contenu: Sorry, but I think these Venta units are over-priced and do not perform anywhere near as well as their specifications would have you believe.  The sq-ft rating for the units (I have been told by Venta) is determined in a closed lab setting with 8-foot ceilings.  If you have a perfectly tight house with those 8-foot ceilings then perhaps you will be satisfied with their "real world" performance.  I have a 1600 sq-ft house with 10-foot ceilings that is not perfectly "tight".  I was using both the Venta LW25 and and LW-45.  Both have been a disappointment compared to the performance of Ultrasonic and Evaporative humidifiers I have tried.  One feature of those Venta units that I consider a very poor design, and I did not think about when purchasing, is the side discharge of both units.  The humidified air exhausts horizontally front and back.  This makes placement of the units next to walls and furniture a potential problem for some.  I prefer units that exhaust up and out so that they can be placed close to walls, drapes, etc.  In addition, Venta states that the chemical additive does not evaporate and get in to the discharged humidified air.  If that is so then why does it keep leaving sticky deposits around the top of the tank and in other nooks and crannies even though I did not splash water in to these areas?  I have to clean the residue with a paper towel when I pull the top off to fill the tanks.  So I am certainly skeptical about that claim from Venta.  I gave my LW25 and LW45 to a friend to use and needed a replacement.  I purchased the LW60-T because it does have a vertical discharge and uses Hygiene Disks which eliminates the need to add their chemical solution to the water tank periodically.  The LW60-T also has a better coverage rating than both of my prior Venta units combined.  I liked the design of the unit, as far as the rollout tank and the noise level go.  However, after 39 days the disk stack in the unit stopped turning.  The gear that engages with and turns the disk stack was wobbly and freewheeling.  There had been some random clicking/chattering noises coming from the LW60-T before it died.  After some back and forth with customer service they agreed to send me a replacement unit.  I also found out that someone else had called in the same problem as I had that same day.  Reading between the lines in Amazon reviews there were one or two others that sounded like they had the same failure I had.  After I received the new replacement unit, filled it, then set it in operation ... it started the "death rattle" after just 6 hours in operation!  Same problem as the 1st.  Every time the rattling noise started, the disk stack stopped.  No disk stack, no humidification.  Obviously there is a design flaw, or a bad production run from the factory.  Inexcusable for a unit that cost me nearly $1000.  I got a refund for the Venta and purchased an Essic Airfare MA-1201, which humidifies better than the LW60. While the MA-1201 is noisier it cost me just $120, so I can live with that. The Aircare is an evaporative unit that humidifies the farthest corners of my house, which the Venta LW60 did not do.  I think I would have had to purchase the Venta LW62, at $1800, to get the same level of humidification that the Aircare MA-1201 provides me at $120.  A ridiculous price for what might have turned in to an expensive doorstop after a few hours of operation.But ,,, the customer service was good.  They worked with me, provided a fairly quick replacement, and finally agreed to the refund when the 2nd unit failed.  Too bad they do not actually manufacture the unit.

It makes a very irritating clicking noise when it's on--my old ones didn't do this--and it emits a rather strong blue light from the buttons whenever it's on. These are both serious flaws since I'm using it in my bedroom, i.e. where I'm trying to sleep. I really don't understand why Venta altered a great design and replaced it with something that makes much less sense.

The solution to keep the tank clean works well. My objection is to the $20 shipping for a $25 bottle of cleaner. If this ridiculous expense had shown up during checkout I would have bought from a 3rd party or just paid for a second bottle of solution.
