I now have it in a closet with guitars and it only raises to 25%. i purchased another unit of a different brand for my bedroom and i can get 30-35% no problem. not happy.

Review.Titre: Cheap quality for high cost products
Review.Contenu: I thought the costumer service would be better, especially since these are high cost, premium humidifier purifiers. A handle broke on the plastic filter cylinder, rendering the whole machine unusable and they wouldn’t even replace the part, but made me buy it. Feels cheap -both in poor plastic quality of materials and in valuing their consumers.

The items arrived in a padded envelope, but no padding inside.  The two gear pieces were not damaged, but they could have been because they have that small spring-like black tab sticking out.  I wish you had individually wrapped them.And gosh, I received a very quick reply from Venta, same day, saying they are trying to reduce carbon footprint.  I appreciate that.  All the thing needed was a separate little piece of paper around each gear, to make sure they didn't bang into each other in the one envelope.

Review.Titre: I  LIVE IN CHICAGO AND HAVE BEEN A…
Review.Contenu: I  LIVE IN CHICAGO AND HAVE BEEN A CUSTOMER WITH VENTA FOR 8 YEARS. I just bought 3 bottles of cleaner and 1 bottle water treament, I only needed 2 bottles of cleaner and  bought the third bottle and the bottle of water treatment @ 22.99 to get free s&h,  I only needed 2  bottles of cleaner @ 12.95 per bottle but because they wanted 7.95 per bottle to ship to me and I live in Chicago I bought the 3 bottles of cleaner and 1 bottle of Water treatment that I will eventually use but not now  FREE SHIPPING at a cost

Darn it. Ordered rubber coupling replacement part but didn’t need it. After part arrived I realized how coupling locked into to seating. I wish manual would have explained further how to reattach coupling (when discs don’t turn).Spent $8 on part, and $32 on shipping. Convert that from USD to CAD

Review.Titre: hard to find the part I needed
Review.Contenu: hard to find the part I needed. VERY expensive shipping with no cheaper options offered. No information on when the part will arrive. Bad enough you no longer sell the part through our local hardware store, but it was an expensive nuisance to buy it through the website.

Review.Titre: I asked a simple question about…
Review.Contenu: I asked a simple question about applying a discount code to my order.  Customer service never replied.  And I did not get the discount that had been emailed to me by Venta.Update: 1-10-20 As a result of my review, Venta sent an email reply today saying that the discount was not good for my order.  The good:  They filled my order on a timely basis with the correct itemThe bad: It took a review to get a customer service response The worst:  After not replying you'd think they would want to make things "right" with the discount. They didn't feel that was the "right" thing to do.

We bought a Venta because we put in a hardwood floor and we live in the desert southwest where the humidity is usually very low. We love that the humidity level stays in the mid 30’s with the Venta. Drawbacks include the fact that it has to be filled quite often and if we leave town we have to ask someone to stop by and fill it (we put it on lowest setting while we are away to conserve water use).  Also, it sometimes is very difficult to clean, with an odd somewhat sticky residue. (No one smokes).  We clean it every 2 weeks.  Otherwise it is quiet, efficient and keeps the humidity up in our large room.

I very much appreciate Venta Airwashers, but I have often bought Venta products from Amazon because they are cheaper at Amazon and always include free shipping. I would much rather purchase Venta Airwasher Products andHumidifiers directly from Venta USA in order to insure authenticity, and also to insure I obtain the newest manufactured products. Cost is always an issue. Please make an effort to lower the prices at Venta USA. I think this is important. FYI: I will soon be looking to purchase a Venta LW45 Humidifier. As of now, it cost $399.99 at Amazon (sold by Venta with Amazon as agent, with Prime) and on Venta USA it costs $449.99

Review.Titre: Trouble with wrong replacement part being shipped
Review.Contenu: Venta's air-washer units are great! We've had 3 of them for MANY years now.The reason I only give them 3 stars here is because, recently, when we had to order a replacement part, they sent the wrong part on the first try and we had to return it.

Hard to answer the question as far as the parts I ordered they arrived in good condition in a timely manner. As for the question about having to replace the parts on a regular basis ( 3 time in 5 years ) I have not received an answer yet.

Review.Titre: I like the unit and the job it does but…Clicking sound
Review.Contenu: I like the unit and the job it does but one area I feel could be improved upon is the Gear and rubber coupling. It  seems to me older technology and I have had to replace the Gear many times as it starts to make an annoying clicking sound.

I bought a Venta LW15 and it was delivered on time. However, the unit was making a scratching noise and I wanted to ask the company about it. I reached out to email and never got a reply. I then called the company during the listed business hours and it went to Venta's voice mail. How crazy is that? Pretty much every company I call has an automated phone system that will keep me on hold until a representative can get to my call, so this felt very unprofessional in comparison. In the end, I decided to try and fix the unit myself. The good news is that the product is designed to be easily opened up and repaired by the end-user, which is exceedingly rare in this age of sealed and disposable products. I found repair information through Youtube videos and service documents on the website.

Review.Titre: Was way more expensive than Amazon used…
Review.Contenu: Was way more expensive than Amazon used to be. I wish they still carried the product. Especially with the shipping cost to Canada. It doubled the price! I’ll find another vendor in the future unless this gets cheaper.

Review.Titre: Overall it humidifies a large room…
Review.Contenu: Overall it humidifies a large room well.  For the price, the controls are not user friendly and the hydrometer is influenced by its own humidification.  There is minimal directions on how to use the Auto function and when using it, it will run at low fan even thought the room is at the target humidity and it frequently runs the fan on high, sees the humidity jump near the unit then slows down to low then sees the humidity return to the room level and repeats.  Never had this issues with many prior humidifiers.  For the price, this unit should have a much better user interface, videos on Youtube on how to use it and ideally, a remote for measuring humidity away from the influence of the unit itself.  On the positive side, its easy to keep clean and refil and holds enough water for a few days between refills.

Ordering on the website had some glitches were items ordered where not in the shopping cart to check out. The combo packs of fragrances did not have many options. The cost of items is higher than can be found at other retailers.

Review.Titre: The price for an empty plastic box
Review.Contenu: The price for an empty plastic box, seems unreasonable. This makes you lean toward, just throw the unit out. If I do that you lose the high profit consumables you sell. Why not encourage me to keep it running by lowering the replacement part cost so I continue to by cleaner and treatment. I think your marketing people need to review their strategy.   When ordering you are limited to the colors white or black but my original is light grey, including the base.After chatting with your support people, who advised I pick the color closest to my unit (?).We finally decided on white. Why not save us all a lot of wasted resource and change the the options to black, white or grey, if you really offer white as well.

Review.Titre: I purchased the LW45 Comfort Plus…
Review.Contenu: I purchased the LW45 Comfort Plus Airwasher. Top of unit is crooked and has gaps in corners where top rests on bottom, but seems to work okay.No reply from customer service email when I inquired about this. The humidity reading on machine seems to  overestimate by ~10% humidity levels as measured by separate hygrometer. Machine will usually read about 50%, while hygrometer two feet away will read 40%All that being said, it does seem to raise the humidity about 4-7% in the immediate area when on full blast. I mainly bought this item so I wouldn't have to clean it all the time, and so far so good in that department. No gross buildup in the tank.For the enormous price tag I expect everything to be perfect, and so the  gaps in the housing, inaccurate hygrometer, and unresponsive customer service were all disappointing. But I am still overall happy with the purchase.
The ordering department works well, I've had to use it several times.  My problem is poor durability of the gearbox, it's life is about one year before needing replacement.

Review.Titre: I  did not like to be charged for…
Review.Contenu: I  did not like to be charged for shipping.
difficult to contact for maintenance. this has deteriorated over the years. I am a long time customer and notice difficulty in communication. Roger Williams

Review.Titre: Careful if you are buying from Canada
Review.Contenu: VENTA charged me a shipping fee and UPS charged an undisclosed import fee. Venta customer service was slow but eventually responded. Thanks.
Nothing special. They sold me a bottle of water treatment that arrived within a week. I had to pay quite a bit for shipping.

Review.Titre: Waiting for return box and label
Review.Contenu: I cannot review yet, because I have not received the box or label in order to send venta back for cleaning.  Requested 8/9/2018.

Review.Titre: Have not received our order complete
Review.Contenu: Have not received our order complete - only received two of four items, yet shipping slip said it was shipped complete.
Small hiccups that delayed delivery.  Contact was confusing.  But it only took 5 mins of online messaging to fix.
needs some work; received my items in a timely manner but communication was laking
Service  is good, product not sure its working properly, still dusty in the room.
expensive, slow shipping...

Manual could have more specific directions on differentiating automatic mode as only controlling the fan motor speed and turbo mode as maximizing fan motor speed but still subject to the “set” RH (which resets on changing modes).Water capacity is less than advertised as it accounts for filling bottom tray and water storage container, but bottom tray has no water making. The water tank itself has less capacity than its much cheaper LW45 counterpart.The room humidity is consistently 10% RH less than the two external digital hygrometers (one as part of a Dyson air purifier and the other as a stand alone) 20 feet away in the same room. Additionally, RH falls up to 17% below target humidity overnight when the heater runs most. NOTE: this is used in my 700 sq. ft finished basement so it should have the capacity to humidify the entire area (I also keep the bedroom and storage room doors closed reducing this area to closer to 450 sq ft. I account for the difference in RH within the room compared to the digital hygrometer built into the unit by increasing its set up by 10%.I was also unaware of the need to replace hygiene discs in this unit at a cost of -$50 every 3 months. This cost more than the HEPA filters from Dyson.Overall, the product seems to humidify in the dry Denver climate, but I am not sure it is worth the cost. I debate whether using two LW45 units would have been better (cheaper upfront cost) with no need to purchase expensive hygiene discs…

I already had had a Venta, but this new update (at a considerably higher price!!) seems to be better. I'm waiting to see if this new machine works better and lasts longer than the previous model. With it up and running for 3 days, it's too soon to tell.

Review.Titre: My Venta Airwasher LW15 Original fits…
Review.Contenu: My Venta Airwasher LW15 Original fits on a bedside table and is extremely quiet even on the second speed. After using it for a week, i have a better sleep and i don’t have a stuffy nose anymore. Although the unit is expensive, it is well worth it. My only 2 issues is that the water treatment additive and cleaner is expensive and the operation indicator and the fan speed display is too bright at night. Other than that, i really love it.

Skeptical of performance of this technology, and thus value proposition, but the LW545 Comfort Plus is marching along nicely. Keeps my house in the 40-46% RH range. I may add another for a second floor BR, and am unsure if the humidistat is needed.  If quietness is critical this model gets a highest recommendation.  We have soft local water, such that prior products only needed filter changes annually, but if you have hard water the filter cost savings may eventually wash out the premium price.

There has been a noticeable difference in air quality and white haze is gone immediately.  The unit is simple to clean compared to other humidifiers and no filters.  I would have given it 5 stars but the blue light from the on/off buttons is bright and can be disturbing to sleep if light bothers you. Also, you must use the additive which is not inexpensive.

Review.Titre: Great product but opaque shopping experience
Review.Contenu: Decent shopping experience and great product. My only issue was a lack of insight into inventory (i.e., whether it was actually in stock) prior to ordering, and then into the status of my order (e.g., any sort of estimate for when it might ship, tracking, etc.). I did get an email after a week or so, telling me that it would ship in 3-5 days, but then little else until it arrived at my doorstep.

This Venta Airwasher works well.  It is quiet and helps to keep my bedroom fresh and humidified.  Unfortunately, the other two I have are not working and I wish I could send them back for whatever it is they need to work again.I have not received any response to my queries about this.I am not good at fixing mechanical problems.Thank you.                Marianne

Review.Titre: Please offer notification option for out-of-stock items
Review.Contenu: Water additive was out of stock for months (perhaps not their fault), but I wish there had been an option to have them send me an email when it came in. After several tries, I found out on their website that they had it, I ordered it, and all went smoothly.

Review.Titre: I am rating this product 5 stars
Review.Contenu: I am rating this product 5 star for its ease of use. It is easy to clean, a major plus. It has different speeds. It does work well as a humidifier. I don’t know how well it works as an air cleaner but it is excellent as a humidifier.

Review.Titre: If you want it really clean.
Review.Contenu: This was the second time in for our 13 year old LW44. I usually clean it myself and store it for summer, but it's pretty raunchy after a few years of my home cleaning. This is a bit expensive, but it comes back so pristine it's worth it to me. The first time I sent it in the original packaging and shipping cartons, and it was returned in the same. This time it was returned in a pretty well packed single box. The only minor problem was when it arrived UPS, I watched him carry it up and drop the box straight down maybe a foot high. When I tried to spin the water wheels with my finger, they were jammed. I pulled them out and gently replaced them and all is well. The cleaning is superb as expected, and everything works properly plugged in and turned on. Thanks for the service.

Review.Titre: Water Treatment Additive is a great product.
Review.Contenu: I bought some Water Treatment Additive for the first time & wish I had tried it years ago! It removed that pink gunk from the wheel with no effort or specialty brushes. It's just great!Why did you stop selling repair parts on you website?

Review.Titre: LP60 KUUBOID XL AIR PURIFIER…Fan and motor noise very quiet
Review.Contenu: Fan and motor noise very quiet. Air quality digital readout accurate..(However I would recommend adding a Humidity readout in the display)

Review.Titre: I love our Venta Air Washer
Review.Contenu: I love our Venta Air Washer. Keeping it clean is my biggest challenge. I have found that using the cleaning fluid is helpful but it should be run overnight or at least 12 hours,  not for 2 hours as suggested. Hope this helps.
It worked out okay to order supply fluids on line, but I preferred when I could get it in person from my local hardware store.

Review.Titre: Love my Venta and the quick arrival of…
Review.Contenu: Love my Venta and the quick arrival of product.  However, I am having troubleapplying for my warranty.  I have called the telephone number for help but donot get an answer.  The answering machine said I would hear from them in2 business day.  No reply, so far.

Review.Titre: I just purchased my second Venta unit!
Review.Contenu: I just purchased my second Venta unit.  I have had the largest one in my ground floor, heated only by wood stove, for over a year.  It works very well so I purchased smaller LW25 unit for my upstairs bedroom.  Venta had it in stock and at better price than online stores.  It shipped free and got to me in 8 days from order!  I like the size and controls plus a humidity display on it.  Good product, good company

Review.Titre: LW45 humidifier used in a large space
Review.Contenu: I live in an ~1000 sq. ft. loft (open floor plan, ~11 ft ceilings) and haven't gotten the humidity past 36 %. I reached out to Venta (you send email because they don't answer the phone) and they say I need two units. I have no space for another unit considering the product is sizable and you must place it a considerable distance from the wall and furnitures. Venta also said to run it continuously at high speed for 7-10 days. For me that's impossible because with loft living, every time I cook the windows and doors must be open so the humidity goes out immediately. What I like about the product: 1) it's quiet at a fan speed of 2 so I can sleep with it on; but the display light is bright so I put a paper on top 2) No need to buy wicks (but you have to buy a water treatment additive 3) The product seems to be solidly made although I have had some issues assembling the unit after taking it apart for water refills. Got E1 and sometimes it says there's not enough water after I have refilled it. Figured it out eventually but prefer to not be having these issues at all. 4) You can use tap water although I use soft water from the bathroom out of overabundance of caution. 5) No white dust is produced as in the case of ultrasonic humidifiers. All in all I will return the unit and get a whole house professional humidifier that is mounted by the furnace (out of sight) and can humidity my large space.
Airwasher is easy to set up and works fine. a bit on the $$ side. If it's like the previous models, it needs to be cleaned regularly; I think we have hard water here.
Prompt and efficient in delivering accessories. The only down side is the high cost and the fact that "free shipping" isn't free.
Set the unit to automatically be at 50% and generally stays about 45% unless it rains. Easy refill and little maintenanace
Venta online service was excellent but delivery delay with UPS caused  about 3 day delay.  However the package arrived intact.

The service was excellent. My only reservation is the price of the product, which, with shipping came out to $50.00 for two 8.5 oz. plastic bottles of cleaner. Much of this price was shipping, to be sure, but still a lot to spend for this.

Review.Titre: Shipping was a little slower than…
Review.Contenu: Shipping was a little slower than others, but so far very satisfied with the Venta is quite and and seems to be well made.

Nice Product.  It was very easy to set up! This is quiet, easy to use and hydrates the air well. Not as good preventing the dust unfortunately but I can get an air filter for that - maybe the 2 dogs are a bit much for it.  Overall very happy with the purchase.
Delivery was fast. Shipping fees are high unless you spend an expensive minimum amount.

As a long time Venta Airwasher owner, I was happy to get a second Venta when I moved from a one bedroom apartment to a two story townhome.  The LW 45 Comfort Plus is a nice size, just about an inch or 2 bigger on all sides than my original LW 45, but covering more sq ft.  Easy to clean and maintain is probably the main reason I got it.  Doubling as an air purifier was the reason for getting the original one.  Although I am not sure of the degree to which it is actually purifying the air.  My reason for 4 stars rather than 5 is that the Comfort Plus model has an obnoxiously bright LED display which would make it impossible to ever use in a bedroom.  If you hit the sleep button, the light will dim some, but the fan also slows to low.  This feature does not allot for customers who may want to keep their Venta on high when they sleep and have no LED light in their bedroom.  Other than that, the new model does have a nice auto feature and a nice auto shut off feature whereby the unit shuts off when it runs out of water.  There's also a nice indicator light which tells you when you need to clean it.  All these features are nice, but for bedroom use, there really should be a display button that you can hit to turn off the display light while you sleep.  Dimming is not enough.  One should be able to turn the light off completely.  Also, the original Venta came with a 10 year warranty.  New Ventas only come with a 2 years warranty.  Why?  Does Venta no longer believe in its product?  I still think Venta is the best, and that's why when it came time to purchase a second humidifier, I went with Venta.  I just wish they would change the display and the warranty.
This is a great machine. However it would be great if it had instructions and some kind of a warranty shipped with it.

Review.Titre: One of the best humidifiers I have…
Review.Contenu: One of the best humidifiers I have gotten in recent times. Great product.
Easy to set up and use. Provides clear, clean and perfectly humidified air! Love it!

Review.Titre: I have not had the unit long enough to…
Review.Contenu: I have not had the unit long enough to give it a thorough evaluation.

Review.Titre: Great improvement to the quality of our…
Review.Contenu: Great improvement to the quality of our air with the Venta products.
Five stars for the product. Four stars for sending a black one while I ordered a white one. The black one seems to fit my room though, so I've kept it.
Well made and shipped, but seems a bit overpriced for what it is..
Pay me, and I'll give you "valuable" feedback.

We are very impressed with the packing and shipping: the two units arrived in perfect condition.  We are pleased with the performance of both air washers.  My only complaint is that the hygrometer on the LW25 “Comfort Plus” unit consistently reads 8-10 percentage points higher than other hygrometers we have brought into the same room (for comparison). As a result, it tends to underperform when in automatic mode.

Review.Titre: Everything you stated about the unit…
Review.Contenu: Everything you stated about the unit has proven to be true, we really enjoy it. The only concern we have is I sent the warranty card in and it was returned to sender, the address on the warranty card was:Venta Air Technologies IncUS Headquarters300 N Elizabeth StSuite 220BChicago, I’ll 60607Not sure what the issue was, but would like to make sure I get the warranty card to you

Review.Titre: This device is very quiet and does a…
Review.Contenu: This device is very quiet and does a great job of controlling the humidity in the room where I keep my guitars. The worst thing for a guitar is to become too dry or wet, and guitar makers recommend storing them at 45 to 55 percent relative humidity.  I live in a very dry place, and the Venta is a great and affordable means of protecting my musical investment.

Review.Titre: Could you have more customer service…
Review.Contenu: Could you have more customer service personnel?I tried calling for 5 or 6 days and finally got through to a wonderful customer service person who was a great communicator who helped resolve my issue. I love my VENTA airwashers, but the delay in getting through by phone has been a problem for me for a number of years.

Good product. Some residue that accumulates in the bottom but is supposed to. Cleans up easily with the cleaning product. I have to fill mine daily as I have a large open house. A larger unit would probably be better for my need but I don't want to have to run 2-3 units so I'm waiting to see how this size unit does for maintaining the humidity in North Dakota winter. Overall, I like the ease of filling with a bucket over having to fill removable tanks as in my previous humidifier.

Review.Titre: Packing material is less than needed
Review.Contenu: Ordered cleaner and additive. They work well.  However bubble wrap on bottom and top of box instead of thin brown packing paper on bottom only is not the way to pack. If you will be using less than desirable packing at least put it on top as well.

Review.Titre: I run my air cleaner constantly during…
Review.Contenu: I run my air cleaner constantly during the winter so need to be able to clean it.  I like this product, it works well, is reasonably priced, but... I thought to postage was a little high for just two small bottles.   I will continue to purchase it, the ordering process was easy - just a little disappointed that the postage was almost more than the product.

The humidifier works great. Easy to clean and fill, and keeps the rooms humidified. The only thing is, I don't like that chemicals have to be added to the water. I worry about the chemicals it's putting out into the air in the room.

Review.Titre: Better description needed for Water Additive and Cleaner
Review.Contenu: Generally, a good Web site but I had to guess the description provided on it for Water Additive and also the Cleaner, so it would be appropriate for my Venta and what I have purchased before and had good results.  I suggest writing in the product previous name (in parentheses) in order for customers to make a distinction if needed.

Works great. It has my entire condo to a humidity of near 50%. That’s all I wanted. It’s great to not need to replace filters during the year multiple times. I am a little concerns about keeping the disks free from calcium buildup.

Review.Titre: Good but small piece broken in shipment
Review.Contenu: The checkout process was fine. The problem was that a small piece of the ordered unit (replacement fan motor assembly) was broken off on arrival. It was a very small bit of one of the two latches and does not prevent the unit from working, but it means the packing was inadequate. The shipping box showed no signs of mishandling.

Have been satisfied with our Venta humidifier for years, but recently had to purchase a new fan motor and dual stack for it. Was disappointed to learn that Venta could offer no discounts on replacement parts, even for a loyal customer of 12 years. Seems to be the trend in all companies to be more worried about attracting new customers with incentives than in retaining long-term ones with rewards in appreciation of their loyalty.

Support response was prompt, but at first not very helpful: I was told that if the fan was running all was well.  Am I a dunce or what?  If the fan is running for 24 hours and no water has left the unit, obviously all is not well.Then I was told how to test and clean the gearbox, which I had already done.  I cleaned it some more and it still was not functional, so I bought another gearbox.

The order site needs work.  I placed my order and was told that my billing address didn’t agree with my card.  Seconds later, my card showed the charge.The next day I got the shipping information.  The order came in a timely manner.

My only negative is that the blue light will not go out.  That's annoying.  We like it pitch black when we sleep, and the light is tiny but so bright.  Otherwise, the new Venta ( I still have my old one that I bought in 2006 : no light on that one) runs quieter; uses less electricity; is designed better;  the controls are easier to use; and sits on a trolley.  I love them both, but, except for the blue light the new one is better.

Replaces older model that’s still running. Send in warranty card as parts did need repairing over 10 years of use. Very effective & economic way to humidify air & control allergies.  New unit is more quiet than older one. Dislike new model’s blue light — obnoxious glare at night. Unnecessary light, not appropriate for nighttime sleeping. Better unit for living room than bedroom.  Overall, much better product than any other filtering system I’ve used.

Review.Titre: I think it's doing a great job because…
Review.Contenu: I think it's doing a great job because it's going through a lot of water each day.  The only problem is that, as a senior, it's difficult to get the water from the kitchen to the Venta in the living room with a 1L jug.  I have to make four or five trips back and forth, even when the Venta's on the lowest setting.  I'm going to try finding something which will hold 2L of water - which would be the heaviest amount I could carry.

Review.Titre: Beats having to buy new humidifiers each year.
Review.Contenu: Delivery not as fast as the new standard set by Amazon, Walmart & Target.  Incredibly expensive for what they are.  Quality product though.  Mine has lasted 10+ years before needing replacement parts.  I clean mine with toilet bowl cleaner to keep the pink bacteria mold at bay.

Review.Titre: Every Home Should Have a Venta!
Review.Contenu: This is a great product, which I've used for close to 15 years with little to no issues. I had to replace the motor, under warranty, and experienced only prompt and friendly customer service. I do recommend the larger model; the mechanisms in the smaller model (at least when I originally purchased it) were not, in my opinion, as effective or quiet. I recently purchased a second 800-square-foot capacity model (L-45) and am thrilled with the improvements made -- with all the same simple, effective construction that makes it work so well and clean up so easily.

This is a good humidifier. I have found no way of measuring or testing the airwashing claim, but it does circulate air through the water, so I give it the benefit. The usual fine dust that comes with humidifiers is less, but then I had to add a chemical additive to the water. It's very quiet and well constructed (not flimsy- I guess the benefit of not being made in China?). I would give it a full rate where it not for the high price. SO long as it continues to work and doesn't break down so I have to add to landfills I am willing to pay the price for a quality product that lasts and is dependable. I think I got what I paid for, but it's been working only for a month. I would be able tobetter  judge after a couple of years.

I like the design. The price is high but I expect it to last 20 years. You need to buy the next size up.  W15 is for Office Cubicle - not big enough for 200 sq./ft.And you have to use a fan to circulate air around the room so the Air Washer can do it's job.

Review.Titre: Needed a part for Venta air cleaner
Review.Contenu: Needed a part for Venta air cleaner and was able to locate it and order it on their website with no problem. It took a few business days before it was shipped and received it two days later. My air cleaner is working again so I am happy.

Review.Titre: We live in the pacific Northwest...
Review.Contenu: We live in the pacific Northwest, fresh air, mountains, the sea. We have an air cleaner in our bedroom and have been cleaning it's filter once a week. It is amazing how much stuff there is in the air!  I began thinking about the air that isn't cleaned, what happens to it? We have been sneezing and coughing and I am convinced it is because of the air we breath in, in our home. I thought, Why not get a air cleaner that both cleans the air, but also places in it moisture as well, to help us breath. So I bought one for our bedroom, then I thought what about the rest of our home, so I bought the big one for our main part of the house.

Review.Titre: Very happy with the unit so far
Review.Contenu: Very happy with the unit so far. The only complaint I have is that it put out a good amount of cold air, not great in the winter but looking forward to that in the summer. Love there are no filters to clean, very easy to maintain.

Review.Titre: have only had this machine for about a…
Review.Contenu: have only had this machine for about a week. air feels cleaner, not sure yet re humidity, since i do not have a way of measuring it. but i till wake up dry mouth. water filling is a little awkward having to take off the cover.

Review.Titre: Delayed delivery, no directions, but the parts work …
Review.Contenu: I expected that when I paid with PayPal my order would be processed essentially immediately.  Instead it was on hold for some time while Venta made sure they got their money before fulfilling the order.  The description in the store listing said there would be installation instructions.  There were none.  None the less, I got the parts I ordered and it was fairly easy to figure out how to install them, and now my Venta airwasher is working correctly again.  I think that deep-cleaning the old transmission unith with distilled vinegar might make it work again, but the new one is working and unless it gets plugged up as the old one did I won't swap the old one back in to see if the cleaning worked.

Review.Titre: I placed 2 orders minutes apart for…
Review.Contenu: I placed 2 orders minutes apart for parts for my old Venta equipment.  I wrote a note on the second order saying please ship together which would have saved shipping charges. This was ignored.
Love my Venta.  Recently ordered some product for my Venta.  Found the site easy to use and my product arrived in a timely fashion.  I was totally satisfied.  Thank you!
Two orders; first was the wrong part, but corrected quickly at no extra fee, second was on the spot. Courteous and efficient, almost perfect. My Venta airwasher is humming just like new. Thanks!

I bought my first Venta airwashers over 20 years ago, and they have been the hardest working and most dependable appliances in my home! They finally gave up the ghost within 6 months of each other, but I’d say almost 21 years of faithful service made them a fantastic investment. The reason I didn’t give 5 stars to their new “cousins” are: the power cord used to be surrounded by thick rubber-coated material which was virtually indestructible. The new airwashers have a very thin, skimpy electrical cord which I can’t see lasting very long. The plastic housing of the airwashers also seems thinner and less robust. The pluses: there is now an automatic turn off switch when the water level gets too low-the older style would just keep running even when completely dry. Also, the lighter-weight housing is easier to carry when it’s full of water. I’m hoping that these new airwashers will give me many years of service.
Love the machine. The fluid needed to keep it working right is overpriced, especially since shipping is almost half the cost of one bottle.

Review.Titre: The website was easy to navigate and…
Review.Contenu: The website was easy to navigate and parts were delivered in a timely fashion. Tho I couldn't believe the cost of the parts, higher than I would have thought.
Great products...great prices.  The only problem is if your shipping address is different from your payment address, you have to contact support.  Seriously?!
Wanted to order on line.  Had trouble with your web site- it was extremely slow.  I didn't know if it went through, so I cancelled and called in my order,

Review.Titre: Most effective humidifier we have tried…
Review.Contenu: Most effective humidifier we have tried so far, but not quite able to humidify a 400 sq ft room and not sure about safety/toxicity of the air washer additive.

Review.Titre: Always easy to order new products but I…
Review.Contenu: Always easy to order new products but I would like to be able to send back a non-working motor so that it can be recycled instead of ending up in land fill.
Great product use 24/7 for instruments to keep at 40 % humidity ;Good back up from company! ...but only lasts a year(bought 3 thru the past 4 years
Nice work in providing stuff
They sell them, service them and sell the parts you may/may not need. They're personable on the phone, and ship whatever is ordered very quickly.
They should tell customers what the components or the liquid additive is. It seems that it is just SDS and a simple detergent can therefore be used.

Review.Titre: I've had no issues with Venta
Review.Contenu: I've had no issues with Venta - I place my order and it's delivered, correctly, in a timely fashion.  Not much more to say than that.
Very good product, could be made even better if there was an easier way to fill. Device is virtually silent & no condensation any where

Review.Titre: The only problem i had was i never got…
Review.Contenu: The only problem i had was i never got an email when my order shipped or a tracking number to get and idea when my order would arrive.

Review.Titre: The product works fine but the price is…
Review.Contenu: The product works fine but the price is pretty high.
Good job, as always.

Review.Titre: I love my Venta air purifiers
Review.Contenu: I love my Venta air purifiers. I wish Venta would offer sales or discounts on accessories (water cleaner, conditioner) more often.

Review.Titre: Aside from having a two way…
Review.Contenu: Aside from having a two way conversation with a computer they responded brilliantly.   Just can't get used to autobots.
Generally a very good product.  I have older units and hard water so get some lime buildup even tho I use the additive.
good overall. Did received the order timely but did not get information on tracking or when it was mailed.
Geraldine was excellent. Really got things moving and solved our problem. 2 day shipping delay was caused by Fedex.

Review.Titre: Make your website more user friendly
Review.Contenu: Make your website more user friendly. I ordered a part saw the picture of the part in needed and got the wrong part

Review.Titre: Great product and works very well
Review.Contenu: Great product and works very well . It is just a bit tedious to clean and maintain, but worth the extra effort !
Quick ship, but crappy shipping in an envelope for multiple pieces that wouldn't tolerate being stepped on.
Website and tracking need updating.  Without it, customers will be hesitant to order.M. COnleyChicago

I have 3 of your units. Last year each motor, one after the other began to make what sounded like a bearing noise. Your "chat" guys told me the little drive wheels needed cleaning. Not so--the bearings (?) wore out. Call me if you would like to hear the noise.       About 5 years ago I was informed that for LW-44 motors my warranty was 5 years. In fact one began to show metal chips in the bottom of the tank recently. I bought a new motor from you at about $120.00 and found I did not get the drive wheel with it. So another $25.00 spent. Sadly, in perusing your website I noticed that my motor had a 10 YEAR warranty and now my unit just missed the cutoff. I have the two remaining and they are progressively getting worse. I will replace them as I really like the units since they keep my house in good humidity control during the Winter months. Seems to me someone did not give me the facts and I could have had my motors replaced under warranty. Wish it were so. Total cost of $435.00 to get all my units running is a bit dicey for this 86 year old retiree. Will probably not make 10 more so you will not have to replace the current ones.  Thanks & stay in business till then --I might need you.    R Gross  989-350-8891 Telly
I don’t give anyone 5 stars,..awesome company, reliable products, excellent results. Thank you.
Very quick delivery, though the shipping charges were as much as the purchase, which is too much.

Review.Titre: Definitely "cleaner" and less dry air inside the apt
Review.Contenu: Air inside the apartment definitely "feels" much better! Cleaner and not too dry.

Review.Titre: Had a few issues ordering on line.
Review.Contenu: Had a few issues ordering on line.Had to talk today customer servic to help fix everything.

Review.Titre: the shipping is always very slow
Review.Contenu: the shipping is always very slow. Considering the shipping isn't cheap
Quick shipping.  Item was well packedThanks for a  QUALITY experience!
Good website, quick delivery. Only caveat: pricey shipping to USA
Personal, caring service from Adam. Truly appreciated.
Quick, professional and courteous service
efficient easy website and payment process

Review.Titre: KUUBOID XL Max is meeting high expectations!
Review.Contenu: The new product -KUUBOID XL Max is working great - very quiet and easy to operate. I have 4 air washer machines from Venta, the oldest is 16 years old and still working great! I wanted an air cleaner which could be used all year long in the bedroom - this new machine appears to fit the requirements!
My new home was very dry ( about 25% humidity) and within just 4 days of running the Venta Air the humidity was up to my desired humidity of 45%, and is maintaining. And the tank is easy to fill!
Ordered my airwasher water treatment and cleaner. Came promptly and delivered to our door.The products seem to have gotten more expensive. I like how the airwasher works.

This is my second Venta air washer, and I love the product.  It is the best humidifier I have ever used because it eliminates those nasty paper filters that have to be replaced and then cannot be found, making your humidifier worthless.  My first one is still ok, but since I’ve had it for five years and this was one sale, I decided to get another one.

These humidifiers are fantastic. Very simple and reliable design, VERY effective. I have one of the larger units in a big room where I keep all of my guitars and banjos and mandolins, and never have to worry about variable humidity in this VERY dry environment (Montana). We have a small unit in our bedroom: perfect! I had to replace a motor assembly once on a unit that was used constantly for 7 years, and the support was great, and immediate. These people are great: seem happy and like a family.

Review.Titre: I have had Venta products in the past…
Review.Contenu: I have had Venta products in the past and have purchased my 3rd one. Simple and effective. That pretty much sums it up.
Easy ordering and prompt delivery. Product is top quality and workmanship matches our older Venta. 10+ years and going strong!

Review.Titre: We’ve had our Venta for ten years
Review.Contenu: We’ve had our Venta for ten year now.  It is still what we recommend to friends.  I’m convinced that there isn’t another brand that surpasses it or even equals it.  The little amount of service we’ve required had been very helpful and supportive.  Our friends whom have taken our advice and purchased one are also very pleased.  Ours works hard all year long since we live in Arizona.
I like its performance. No wet anymore. Little bit big but acceptable. Very convenient. The most important thing is really really easy to clean!!!
Ordering replacement maintenance items on line was easy and the price is competitive.  Delivery was timely.  Your product continues to provide humidified air to my sleeping space.

Review.Titre: I think it's the best humidifier I ever…
Review.Contenu: I think it's the best humidifier I ever used. I came across with this product because it's so popular in Korean community. I see why they are so eager about it.
Product quality is good. Initial setup was easy. User interface on the control screen is very intuitive.
Simple order of supplies for two venta air filters.  Delivered within five days I believe.  Thanks.

Review.Titre: Venta: High Quality and Long Lasting
Review.Contenu: We have had our first Venta for 13 years and it is still going strong.  When we needed a humidifier for our other home, Venta was the obvious choice.  We are very happy so far with our AW 902 professional model.  It was delivered quickly and was very easy to set up.  Other humidifier brands just do not last.
This machine is easy to use, humidifies and cleans the air and is just an amazing yet simple technology!
The best humidifiers.  Hands down.  I've owned two Ventas and retired my first one after about 20 years.  There is no other.

I had placed an order for some maintenance products for my humidifiers. Shortly after okacing the order I discovered I had made an error in the order. I talked with someone in customer service and the issue was resolved quickly and courteously.I would also like to add a comment about customer service for my humidifier. My humidifier kept turning off. The lady at customer service did some trouble shooting. She was patient and knowledgeable and my problem was solved with that single phone call. Ventana products are the best and they are supported by a great customer service team.

Review.Titre: A Life changing purchase Helps my allergic rhinitis and…
Review.Contenu: Helps my allergic rhinitis and breathing easier. I sleep better than before.It could be a life changing item I’ve ever purchased. Wish to get the bigger size. Thank you for making such a product.

Review.Titre: Glad to see that Venta has added an…
Review.Contenu: Glad to see that Venta has added an online shopping feature to their website. I found what I wanted and checkout was easy. Grateful that I didn't have to go to a third party retailer. The prices were fair, and my order arrived in two days.
Delivered on time…already making a positive difference in the air of the room

Review.Titre: The delivery of the cleaning fluid…Thank you much for your response.  I appreciated it and will follow your directions for cleaning my Venta which I have enjoyed for several years now.
Review.Contenu: The delivery of the cleaning fluid arrived from Europe later than expected but successfully. Attempts to contact Venta for directions in English for use were promised but never communicated.  The English video I found on YouTube did not answer my question: How many ml. of the 250ml. in the bottle sI would should be applied in cleaning the humidifier/airpurifier.  I would appreciate a response.
Great product, seamless ordering process and fast shipping.
We are loving our new Venta evaporative humidifier. Works so great and so clean. Easy maintenance.

Review.Titre: Operates Quietly and I don't have to replace filters
Review.Contenu: The evaporative humidifier is a great product for our high altitude semi-arid climate.  It operates very quietly, has a large water tank, and does not require filter replacement which was the deciding factor in our purchase.  My Mom recommended the Venta product to me based on over a decade of use in her home, and I would also recommend Venta after our purchase.

Our 15-yr-old LW45 has performed admirably.  It added two gallons of winter humidity to our patio home every day.The unit has required a couple motor replacements, and one was provided for free by Venta.We discovered that fan drive longevity can be improved with occasional squirts of silicone spray.The design upgrades of our new LW45 are immediately apparent.Hoping that the motor will require less attention than our old one.
Able to replace a part of the Venta quickly.

Review.Titre: Everything works great and runs very…
Review.Contenu: Everything works great and runs very quiet. Keeps the air fresh and clean. I had a very old model and it quit working and could really see a difference in the air quality without one. So glad I could purchase another one. Shipping was very fast too.

Review.Titre: Got the LW25 comfort plus air washer…
Review.Contenu: Got the LW25 comfort plus air washer humidifier. Wanted to wait about one month before I commented on it. So far it's great. No problems, works as advertised. Questions about their products answered quickly by customer service--a big plus! Venta products are top notch. Would definitely recommend anything Venta makes.

Review.Titre: For the first time I have confidence…
Review.Contenu: For the first time I have confidence that a humidifier is working correctly. Thinking back, I'm not sure how I found Venta, but very pleased in the whole transaction. One side note is that I did not think Venta's would be discounted on Black Friday, that extra incentive would have made buying a second unit so much easier.

Review.Titre: I had two Venta LW45's thoroughly…
Review.Contenu: I had two Venta LW45's thoroughly cleaned.  Sending my machines for cleaning was simple and convenient and they were returned in pristine condition.  The price was reasonable, and the process worked precisely as promised.  It was like buying two new machines.

We have quite a few Venta Air Washers after a friend recommended them to help with my allergies.  We like the design and the fact that it prevents mold build up.  Easy to clean and keep maintained.  We had a small issue with one of the fans tapping but it was easily resolved after going to You Tube and finding a video on how to flip the fan and stop the tapping.  We do follow the instructions regarding regular cleaning and maintenance and have had very few issues.

The product (LW45) is very high quality and have worked without fault for years. Now we had to replace a small part and contacted the international service department via the form on their web page. Within a working day, a local dealer contacted me with all necessary information and a link to the exact product I needed. The spare part was very reasonably priced and is already on its way.

Review.Titre: I placed a call which was returned by a…
Review.Contenu: I placed a call which was returned by a nice person within the promised time frame.I had been able to order on-line in the meanwhile. To me that means your on-line interface is an effective alternative even for reluctant on line shoppers like me.Thanks. We love our venta air washer which was given to us by a German friend who was relocating back to Europe. It is so durable and easy to clean. We bought the cleaner from you and that worked very well. Now it is clean and dry and in its box for storage til next fall.

We just LOVE Venta, have been using them for decades!   Easy to maintain and it WORKS.  I especially love the fact that we can send our unit to you to be cleaned.  No matter how well I clean my Venta, our water quality sometimes changes and I always worry about there being buildup that I haven't been able to get.

Review.Titre: We purchased a Kuuboid air purifier…
Review.Contenu: We purchased a Kuuboid air purifier over a year ago for our optical office during covid. It gave us great peace of mind to know we were doing everything to keep ourselves and our clients safe during this pandemic. The machine performs quietly and is easy to service as it monitors the condition of it's filters constantly. We are very satisfied with our Venta experience!

The Venta is a reliable humidifier -- its higher price is more than worth its performance and I LOVE that the company takes the machine back to clean it. Other humidifiers have needed a deep clean after a season of use and usually I can't get at the parts that most need cleaning.

Review.Titre: This effective humidifier is almost silent
Review.Contenu: The humidifier is almost silent yet has steadily boosted the humidity in the bedroom into the comfort zone. I like that it doesn't need filters and only has to be cleaned every 10-14 days. Expensive but not when you factor in the cost of filters and the time to clean it more frequently.

Sent humidifier to Venta for professional cleaning.  The returned unit was very clean …almost like new.  However, one corner of the lower part of of the unit was cracked and broken into small pieces at the corner.  As a result, the upper part of the unit would not sit properly on the bottom.  The returned unit was poorly packaged and the box had been damaged. Contacted customer service and sent them photos.  Customer service was terrific.  They were friendly, professional  and responsive.  I was promptly sent a new lower casing

Review.Titre: Good product.  Good service.  But expensive.
Review.Contenu: Venta Air Technologies had the water conditioner product I needed in stock, and shipped it to my home quickly.  I would temper my 5 star rating by noting that their maintenance products are really expensive and shipping costs excessive.  A 1 liter bottle of solution which is 99+% water cost me $45.  The expense of maintaining my Venta Airwasher will likely discourage me from buying another.

Review.Titre: I purchased two Venta Airwahers from…
Review.Contenu: I purchased two Venta Airwahers from this company; a LW 25 and a LW 45. Both are from their ComfortPlus line. I love them because I can use tap water to fill them. They have German engineering and Ventwave technology. I know they are working because I have to fill them every day.

Review.Titre: This is a Great Company who sells a Great, Reliable, and safe product.
Review.Contenu: The ordering process is simple and straight forward. Shipping is the same day or the next and I always receive my order within days and in excellent condition.

Review.Titre: Reliable, durable affordable, and just works great
Review.Contenu: We’ve been using the center for 18 years. It’s worked very well for us and you will find the air and cleaning it. We have a cat in the house analogies and even though this is not an air purifier We’ve been very satisfied with it. The original model we had just needed to be replaced after 18 years. The only thing I’m disappointed is the original warranty was 10 years and now it’s two. I do see some improvements in the case, but otherwise is the same wonderful piece of equipment we bought 18 years ago.

Review.Titre: This humidifier is very quiet I don’t…
Review.Contenu: This humidifier is very quiet I don’t even hear it nor do I see the movement of air. It provides a high level of comfort in my home.  I have the L 45 comfort plus and with no filters to worry about it’s a great product.  I had a seers humidifier for quite a few years and it was noisy and the filters would need to be changed and purchased each year. I would highly recommend this humidifier to anyone that is looking to purchase a quality product.

Review.Titre: I absolutely LOVE my VENTA Humidifier!
Review.Contenu: I absolutely LOVE my VENTA Humidifier!. I was using one of the drug store humidifiers before, I had ordered a different brand that I discovered didn't have the features I wanted and returned it.  I am so glad I came across the VENTA, It ran over 3 days before I put more water in it (the light didn't come on, I simply did it for convenience).  I love how quiet it is on the "Sleep" mode; I love how you can set the "humidity percentage"; and the overall simplicity of use.  I can fill it, set it and let it go.  I have severe dry eye and I need a humidifier I can count on.  In fact, I will likely order another one within the next 2-3 months for our family room.  I HIGHLY recommend this product!
The product arrived well wrapped/ boxed. Very easy to assemble, excellent construction, no noise, wish I had of bought a bigger one, maybe next year.Definitely will recommend to friends
Purchased some replacement parts for older air cleaner. PERFECT!everything in stock, well packed, shipped immediately. Great -- fast delivery! And a great product.

We had an issue with the fan in our Venta making a loud noise. I reached out to customer service and received a response via email. Anna was great to work with and she provided several steps to take to see if we could remedy the issue. When those did not do the trick she assisted me in ordering the part that was needed to get us back in full working order. She was kind, helpful and timely in responses. Great experience and they have a great product - we have three Ventas and I don’t know what we’d do without them!

When I sent in my two Airwashers for regular ultrasonic cleaning, one of them came back damaged. Jen was very helpful, gave me specific instructions as to what she needed from me so she could file a claim with UPS, and she immediately sent me the parts to replace the damaged ones. I have had Airwashers for many years, and recommend them to everyone, not only because they are effective and easy to use, but also because of Venta's superb customer service.
My air washer looked spotless and the turnaround time was much quicker than expected. Bravo for great service.

Instead of the 4-6 week turn around time estimate, I got 11 days from drop-off at  Fedex to return to my home.  I have extremely hard water, but the ultrasonic cleaning made my Venta almost brand new.

This product has really impressed me. I was afraid it wouldn't suit my requirements, but it did. The instructions on the internet were precise, clear, and simple. The new product is even prettier, with a stronger structure and more external features.

Review.Titre: I have been very happy with our Venta…
Review.Contenu: I have been very happy with our Venta Airwasher.  Your bi-weekly water treatment additive and the 6 month cleaner work very well.  Have had no mechanical failures as yet and we have owned it for several years.
The product is excellent and it was very easy to order from your website.

Review.Titre: Have been a Venta customer for years
Review.Contenu: Have been a Venta customer for years - best ever humidifier; they last for years, and parts are easy to get and install. And, even though the additive is a bit pricey, not needing replacement filters evens it out.
It was very easy to assemble and easy to figure out.

Review.Titre: After 6 winter seasons of use my Vents…
Review.Contenu: After 6 winter seasons of use my Vents had become clogged. I found help online, but was not able to remove the connections easily. When I asked for help, I was told by email that I could mail my unit in to Vents and, for a reasonable charge, it would be cleaned and refurbished and returned to me , postage paid. Three weeks later it was received ready for more years of service. I love my Vents. It keeps my piano soundboard safe, and my chronic dry eyes comfortable. I cannot do without it!

Review.Titre: I replaced my 2007 Venta this year
Review.Contenu: I replaced my 2007 Venta this year.  I like that both the old and new humidifiers are easy to clean, quiet, easy to refill, and leave no residue.  I have another unit that is about four years old.  I have a 1525 square foot home and use the two units continuously from December through March each year.

This is the second Venta I've owned.  The first lasted about 10 years and never stopped working, but I replaced it.  I have a piano which needs to be kept at a constant humidity in a large living room and it does the job.  No filters are involved.

I have two LW45's.  This year I have purchased two new units. These replace units that I purchased 20 years ago!  My Steinway "L" Grand Piano is in great shape largely because these LW45's have kept the humidity up during the dry winter months.  Manythanks to Venta Airwasher.

Review.Titre: Venta has wonderful products that work…
Review.Contenu: Venta has wonderful products that work well and are amazing simple and easy to clean. The customer service was wonderful and everything so far has been amazing. I recommend Venta to everyone I know with humidifier and air purification needs

Review.Titre: Once I was able to speak to a live…
Review.Contenu: Once I was able to speak to a live agent, things went very smoothly.The replacement parts arrived quickly, and the online instructions were accurate, clear and concise - I was up and running in no time!

Review.Titre: The machines are like new again!
Review.Contenu: I would not have believed that the machines could be made so clean--they look like new! And when I was unable to get one of them to work, the immediate response from Venta solved the problem. Excellent service!

Review.Titre: A life saver if you suffer from nosebleeds
Review.Contenu: Wow, what a great product! The humidifier does such a good job keeping my apartment at a decent level. I live in Vegas and needless to say it’s miserably dry here, but this doesn’t struggle at all.I haven’t had a single nosebleed since I’ve gotten this. It does churn through water, though!

Review.Titre: I had a great experience sending my air…
Review.Contenu: I had a great experience sending my air washer in for cleaning!   The motor wasn’t working, but they helped me track down my warranty so that they could fix it under warranty.  Anna was a great help!!!

Review.Titre: The humifiers are quieter and more…
Review.Contenu: The humifiers are quieter and more efficient than any other humidier I have seen.
Great description on the site, which made selection easy. Though not inexpensive, the item is high quality, and beyond that, simple enough to last years. It’s so quiet, too.

Great product! Pricey, but no more so than other high end humidifiers. Does the job with a simple and effective design. Yes, in this case, less is definitely more!  Easy to use, easy to clean, no pricey filters to buy. The water is your filter.
This is a fantastic machine.This is the easiest humidifier we have ever used. It's quiet, easy to fill, easy to clean and does a great job of humidifying. We can' ask for more than that!

My second air washer. Gets rid of odors and makes heated air comfortable. My first one was used for 7-8 years. Prevented dry skin and nose bleeds, things common for me with heated air. Only thing I regret is that the price has risen substantially.

Review.Titre: paid for order and never received the items.  Order #81523
Review.Contenu: ordered water softener, paid for it, never received the items.. Order #81523 December 17, 2022. Venta employee followed up and I was able to retrieve incorrectly addressed package. Venta employee was very helpful.

We have only been using our Venta airwasher for a few days, but so far I think it's working.  Our house doesn't seem to be as dusty as it was and it feels like we can breath a little easier.  The airwasher is easy to use, easy to fill, and is exactly as it was described.  Very happy with my purchase so far.

Review.Titre: Very quick turnaround from ordering to…
Review.Contenu: Very quick turnaround from ordering to receiving!! Love my Venta, the air feels so washed clean!

Review.Titre: Arrived on time and works perfectly
Review.Contenu: Arrived on time and works perfectly. Easy to use and clean. I personally found that the unit is more effective if it is elevated to a tabletop or counter rather than it being left on the floor.

Easy to order Venta supplies, which arrived promptly. The local hardware store where I purchased my humidifier and supplies has closed here. I wish for another local supplier as shipping is expensive.
I ordered ultrasound cleaning of my venta humidifier and I’ve got it back super clean like it’s brand new. Great job. Thank you so much!
Are accessories sold anywhere? This was a gift for my niece. We live in Denver. Water treatment needs to be ordered immediately.
Great product.  Expensive but worth it.  Quick delivery and easy to set-up.
The Venta works Great! All the other humidifiers, and there were plenty of others,left a white film on everything. The Venta does not! It is quiet and efficient- worth the upgrade and the price.

Immediate confirmation of my order, clearly identified billing entry, prompt shipping, kept me apprised of order and shipping status, goods arrived exceptionally well packaged and with everything I expected. Great experience and great product, so far; I would not hesitate to transact with Ventra again.

We recently purchased two Venta Comfort Plus room humidifiers: the LW25 and the LW45. They are a world of difference away from our old humidifiers. We've tried evaporative and ultrasonic in the past, and while both types worked to humidify well, they came with a lot of additional work: constant decalcifying for the evaporative humidifiers, while the ultrasonics left a sticky fine dust everywhere in the house. Both styles were noisy and required a lot of additional cleaning over the season as well.The Venta Comfort Plus technology is simple, efficient, and very quiet. Except when running at its highest mode, the Venta humidifiers are nearly silent. They are incredibly easy to care for, and if one regularly uses the Venta Water Treatment Additive, the humidifiers only need a quick rinse and refresh every two weeks. My only work now is filling the tanks every morning so the humidifiers can keep us comfortable throughout the day. I highly recommend Venta; they are worth the extra cost in terms of quality of workmanship, performance, and ease of use!
Extraordinary product. Simple to set up, very high quality. And not ugly like most humidifiers!

Review.Titre: Scheduling service on the Website was…
Review.Contenu: Scheduling service on the Website was seamless.  Service provided as indicated and within time frames given.  Thank You!
Truly great product. I don’t like how they added LED as they don’t add any value to me, but the product itself is still the same amazing quality and benefit.
My air cleaner does a wonderful job, moisturizing the air and cleaning it. Very helpful for my breathing in this dry air here.

Review.Titre: Makes my life easier, yet keeps it humidified
Review.Contenu: I really like that the Venta is easy to clean and fill, can go 2 weeks between cleanings, requires no filters, is evaporative so you can't over-humidify, traps airborne allergens, works quietly, and doesn't leave white dusty residue on my walls. There is an additive and a cleaning agent to buy but I appreciate that these items keep the day-to-day cleaning requirements of the machine to a bare minimum compared to the ultrasonic humidifiers I've had in the past that sorely missed the mark in many ways. After purchasing one Venta last winter and seeing it in action, I decided it was worth getting two more this winter to cover two bedrooms and the main living area.

Very timely arrival. Everything just like I ordered and working well.  I bought the Venta 45 and it has helped immensely in my piano room. Review.Titre: I'm quite impressed with this product
Review.Contenu: I'm quite impressed with this product.  I thought it wouldn't meet my needs and it does.  My place is now reaching the humidity level I wanted.  I had 10 to 13% humidity before and now 30%.  On top of that, it really is low noise.  When I go to bed, I crank it up and its no bother.  It took a few weeks to get it up to par but it did it.  I have over 600 sq feet.  I add the water treatment every two weeks and there is no mildew nor white dust.
